Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone.text: Absolutely magical! I felt like I was at Hogwarts.
A bit slow at the start but it hooked me later.
Great for kids and adults alike.
Re-read this 10 times, never gets old!
Could have used more world-building early on.
The illustrations in my edition made it even better.
Best fantasy book for children ever written.
Some pacing issues, but the charm outweighs it.
Made me fall in love with reading.
A true classic that defined my childhood.
